Please select the Garmin device connected to your Android phone.

Body Fat Control is a pair of free and OpenSource Android app and Garmin Connect IQ app, to help users daily control their calories consumed and calories spent. By controlling the balance of calories consumed VS calories spent, is possible to manage the amount of fat stored on the body.

Body Fat Control have a strong focus on calories balance and heart rate values (for instance, no steps values are used). Calories spent are calculated only based on the user heart rate, weight, height and age, using well know scientific formulas. The calculated values are near the ones calculated from Garmin.

For more information, please visit the Body Fat Control page.
